---
title: "Preface"
---

These notes summarise the Academy for PhD Training in Statistics (APTS)
module "Statistical Machine Learning" taught by Louis J.M. Aslett from
13th to 17th September 2021 [@aslett2021].

The content aims to give a broad overview of statistical machine learning 
methods to PhD candidates who already have a good understanding and intuition 
of statistics.
    
Chapters in this document reflect the chapters in the source material
for easier further reading and comparison.
